评论概述: HIGH QUALITY & SO VERSATILE! ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED!!
评论详情: OK I am absolutely in love with this item!! I’ve been looking for a nice basic piece like this that I can wear for different occasions and I was so surprised when this came in the mail because it’s really high-quality and it fits so well! It is a body-con fit so it’s going to show off your sexy curves ;) I always feel super sexy and confident in it! The material is very nice and high quality! It is super soft, smooth and buttery, almost like the skims fabric, which I love. The fabric hugs your body so it’s very comfortable! It is almost like a second skin. I love how this item is so versatile too! I could wear it as a sexy dress or tuck it into my jeans and wear it as a tank top. It’s  just so cute, minimal, and easy to style. For your reference, I ordered a size small in black, and I am 125lbs, 5’4”. Overall, I highly recommend this item and I will definitely be getting them in all the colors!!

I am a dance teacher who uses these under my shirts/over my leggings while teaching.  I bend and get up and down a lot and everything stays covered and in place.  It is WAY easier than using a leotard, especially for quick restroom breaks.  They seem durable as my first two have been washed for over a year and have held their shape and compression.  I am 5'7" and these are long enough to completely cover my backside.  One shirt was a little too tight under the armpits and i gave each a small snip with scissors to release the binding.  It hasn't run or shred in that area at all after many months of use and washes.  It's a great undershirt for these purposes!  I have these in black, grey, and navy and use them multiple times a week.
